name: Atomic Janitor
description:
Far in the future, the Earth is laden with nuclear waste.

Luckily most of it has been contained and waits out the centuries in conveniently color coded barrels. You've taken a great summer internship in a storage facility and have been tasked with programming the janitorial robots to move this dangerous waste to other parts of the facility.

Why? Who knows, you're just the intern.
